item.title: Powell may use Jackson Hole speech to hint at how fast and how far the Fed could cut rates
item.description: Federal Reserve officials have said they’re increasingly confident that they’ve nearly tamed inflation.

item.title: ‘Hitting kids should never be allowed’: Illinois bans corporal punishment in all schools
